Name: Minimize Total Development Time
Description: Reduce the sum of all sprint durations

Name: Maximize Delivered Feature Count
Description: Increase the number of completed features by release

Name: Minimize Cost Variance
Description: Keep actual spend as close to budget as possible

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Improve average satisfaction score from reviews

Name: Maximize Team Utilization
Description: Maximize ratio of planned story points to capacity

Name: Minimize Defect Count
Description: Reduce number of blockers and bugs per release

Name: Maximize Velocity Trend
Description: Increase trend in average story points per sprint

Name: Minimize Carryover Stories
Description: Reduce number of user stories carried to next sprint

Name: Maximize On-time Release Probability
Description: Increase probability of meeting planned release dates

Name: Minimize Resource Over-allocation
Description: Reduce instances where assigned effort exceeds availability
